message: Pin versions in apt get install. Instead of `apt-get install <package>` use `apt-get install <package>=<version>`
Pin versions in gem install. Instead of `gem install <gem>` use `gem install <gem>:<version>`
Note that A && B || C is not if-then-else. C may run when A is true.
Use var=$(command) to assign output (or quote to assign string).
Use arguments JSON notation for CMD and ENTRYPOINT arguments
